metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12441 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition 8.4 through 11.11. The protected branches feature contained a access control issue which resulted in a bypass of the protected branches restriction rules. It has Incorrect Access Control.

notes.Note: msalvatore> Affects GitLab CE/EE 8.4 and later.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
